content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your personal data will be stored for the duration of your employment, and to the extent necessary to comply with comply with our legal obligations. Statutory retention periods apply to certain records (for example, employers are obliged to keep records of employees' working time for a period of three years).  We may further retain your personal data for up to 7 years following termination of your employment for the exercise or defense of legal claims. Our retention periods are reviewed and updated from time to time in line with legal requirements and best practice. For further information concerning our data retention practices please see the 'Questions' section below. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
